subject: Horse Racing
Movies
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Kentucky Derby
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: “50 to 1” details the hard-to-believe victory of Mine That Bird in the 2009 Kentucky Derby, and the rough-hewed cast that surrounded the horse.
snippet: “50 to 1” details the hard-to-believe victory of Mine That Bird in the 2009 Kentucky Derby, and the rough-hewed cast that surrounded the horse.
